other_title: 奴隷メイドプリンセス (Japanese)
plot: As she's been taken prisoner by the main character and her childhood friend, Eric, the battle princess Lotte has ended up training to be a slave maid princess made in order to prolong her life. Slave Maids are specially trained maids which exist for the pleasure of the noblemen. While providing sexual services, they also live by working as bodyguards who put their lives on the line for the protection of their masters, making them very valuable to both royalty and noblemen. The battle princess Lotte loses her virginity and must endure dirty and degrading training in order to turn her whole body into a sex toy.Taken prisoner by the main character, battle princess Lotte has ended training to be a slave made in order to prolong her life. Slave maids are specially trained maids traded among the noblemen. While providing sexual services, they also live by working as guards who put their lives on the line for the protection of their masters, making them very valued to both royalty and noblemen. The battle princess loses her virginity and has to endure dirty and degrading training in order to turn her whole body into a sex toy.
